Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Nagle/Hyacinth St
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Nagle/Hyacinth St.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Milwaukee, Austin, Bryn Mawr and Nagle: due to, street blockage near Nagle/Hyacinth St.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
